first_para: Stephen James Metcalfe (born 9 January 1966) is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for South Basildon and East Thurrock since May 2010. Metcalfe is married to Angela, with whom he has two children, Tom and Katie. Both Stephen and Angela work in their family printing business.

full.extract:
Stephen James Metcalfe (born 9 January 1966) is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for South Basildon and East Thurrock since May 2010. Metcalfe is married to Angela, with whom he has two children, Tom and Katie. Both Stephen and Angela work in their family printing business.
^ "Steve Metcalfe MP". BBC Democracy Live (BBC). Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whoswho/U251255/
^ http://www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/59418/notices/1118281/from=2010-05-06;to=2010-05-19;all=returned+westminster/
full.title: Stephen Metcalfe (politician)
